document.full_text: south korean president lee myung-bak said monday he was ready to invite north korea's leader kim jong-il to a security summit if he agreed to renounce nuclear weapons and apologized for clashes last year.
document.title: south korea open to summit with north if conditions met
lines_and_colors: south korean president lee myung-bak said monday he was ready to invite north korea's leader kim jong-il to a security summit if he agreed to renounce nuclear weapons and apologized for clashes last year.
